info.name: Denon Prime GO - Mixxx Mapping
info.author: Levi "Whanake" Williams
info.description: This is a Work-In-Progress mapping to allow the Denon Prime GO to be used with Mixxx, ideally with the same (if not more) functionality than the Prime GO provides as a standalone device.
info.wiki: Encoded URL to Mixxx wiki page documenting this controller mapping
info.forums: Encoded URL to Mixxx discussion forums page for this controller mapping

control.description: Deck 1 - Sweep FX A Button ON
Deck 1 - Sweep FX A Button OFF
Deck 2 - Sweep FX A Button ON
Deck 2 - Sweep FX A Button OFF
Deck 1 - Sweep FX B Button ON
Deck 1 - Sweep FX B Button OFF
Deck 2 - Sweep FX B Button ON
Deck 2 - Sweep FX B Button OFF
Deck 1 Vinyl / Grid Edit Button On
Deck 1 Vinyl / Grid Edit Button Off
Deck 2 Vinyl / Grid Edit Button On
Deck 2 Vinyl / Grid Edit Button Off
Deck 1 Sync / Key Sync Button On
Deck 1 Sync / Key Sync Button Off
Deck 2 Sync / Key Sync Button On
Deck 2 Sync / Key Sync Button Off
